text: Pope Anastasius III (; died June 913) was an Italian cleric of the Roman Catholic Church and the 121st Pope from 911 until his death in 913. "List of Popes," Catholic Encyclopedia (2009); retrieved 2012-8-27. ==Early life== Anastasius was born in Rome."Pope Anastasius III", Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2011-8-27. ==Pope== Anastasius was elected pope in 911. "Anastasius," Encyclopedia Britannica (1911); retrieved 2012-8-27. He was pope during a period when Rome and the Papacy were in the power of the Theophylact family.Bunson, Matthew. (2004). OSV's Encyclopedia of Catholic History, p. 74. He was active in developing the dioceses of Germany. He was buried in St. Peter's Basilica. ==Related pages== * List of popes ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Italian popes Category:10th-century births Category:910s deaths
title: Pope Anastasius III
